title: Harden fit scoring service input validation to prevent invalid values from skewing fit scores

sections.text: The fit scoring service currently accepts missing/NaN/out-of-range values (and unexpected enums) and silently coerces/defaults them, producing misleading fit scores and driver breakdowns even when the CSV import is normalized. Add strict schema validation at the scoring boundary, reject/flag invalid records, and ensure invalid fields are excluded from scoring with a clear error payload returned to the caller. This should surface actionable per-field validation errors without blocking scoring for otherwise-valid customers.
